author: Kevin Beary
description: Bittersweet, spicy and fruity – Reggae Tiki in style, if indeed there is such a cocktail style?
name: You're Not My Real Trinidad
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters
45 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
